content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Fragment
flickering candle

# Context
Power was out in the neighborhood. <fragment>flickering candle</fragment> The room smelled faintly of wax.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Fragment
morning chill

# Context
Dew still clung to the grass. <fragment>morning chill</fragment> The city had not yet woken up.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Fragment
folding chairs

# Context
Volunteers prepared the hall. <fragment>folding chairs</fragment> Music would start in twenty minutes.
